mapper.select:
select
from wxtb_user where account != 'admin0000'
and account like '%${account}%'
and username like '%${name}%'
and enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and department_code like '%${department}%'
and account in
#{item}
order by create_time asc
